content:
I don't have access to current news or future plans of the government of asia minor. however, it's worth to note that some countries in the region have made efforts to expand their industrial sectors in recent years. 
for instance, turkey has significantly boosted its manufacturing industry over the past decade and has made efforts to improve its infrastructure to stimulate further growth of the industrial sector. additionally, some countries in the region are looking to diversify their economies by investing in new technologies and supporting startups to further leverage technological advances in the global market.

however, there is also a trend towards sustainable development and eco-friendly alternatives, which may prioritize a more balanced distribution between industry and agriculture in the region.
